Package index

Data Utilities

Functions for data manipulation

vslice()
Slice a Vector
load_data()
Load a Dataframe from any File Format
read_data()
Read a Dataframe from any File Format
flip_names()
Flip Keys and Values in a Named Vector or List
name_to_title()
Convert Names to Title Case
name_to_upper()
Convert Names to Upper Case
add_log_to_name()
Add Log() to Variable Names
remove_log_label()
Remove Log Labels from Column Names

Plotting Utilities

Functions for plot customization

cocopack_theme()
Create a Custom ggplot2 Theme
closer_legend()
Add a Closer Legend to ggplot
view_ggplot2_shapes()
Display Available ggplot2 Shape Palettes

Stats Utilities

Functions for statistical analysis

run_bootstrap()
Run Bootstrap Analysis
spearman_boot()
Spearman Correlation with Bootstrap
label_significance()
Label Statistical Significance

Package Utilities

Package + R environment utilities

print_r_info()
Print system information about R
get_package_bibtex()
Get Package Citation in BibTeX Format
